review_details: We had a brilliant day out with this tour. It was a unique experience being out on a fishing boat and watching the guys catch the fish - the lunch of fresh fish was something to remember! I'd highly recommend
reviewFor: Santorini Traditional Fishing Experience with transportation

review_details: Beautiful sunset views, incredible food and fantastically friendly staff. We visited this restaurant on our honeymoon and it was made really special for us, we would definitely go back. 5 stars.
